deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 5 hrs 27 mins
features: Long-term durability: MSMK water-based limestone technology effectively addresses issues such as the non-stick coating chipping off, peeling off, scratching easily, small bubbles forming at the bottom, breaking, and pieces of non-stick material mixing with the food after months of use.

Even heating: MSMK non stick frying pans features a 4mm thick aluminum substrate with even heat distribution and steady simmering, preventing burning at the bottom or corners. This resolves the issue of poor heat control in thin aluminum cookware, which often leads to burnt food.
Cleanup was exceptionally easy: in MSMK scorch test where we simmer sauce for 30 minutes and see how it rinses off, it required no soaking in water to get the job done, saving time and effort.

Comfort handle: Long, thick or wide handles are comfortable to hold and designed to stay cool. Avoiding handles that are poorly designed can makes it painful to pick up or maneuver, and may even burn you handle. A well-designed handle can greatly enhance the pleasure of cooking.

Induction and glass stovetop-friendly: The stainless-steel bottom of this frying pan set enables faster induction heating, with a speed 15% higher than the PRO frying pans. The smooth bottom is specifically designed to prevent any scratches on your glass stove top, ensuring the longevity of its shiny appearance for years to come.

LIFETIME WARRANTY: Designed in the USA with imported components, our comprehensive quality control system has significantly reduced defects in our frying pans nonstick. We stand behind our MSMK cookware set and offer a 100% replacement policy at no charge if any issues arise due to manufacturing or material defects of the 10 12 inch frying pan.

The MSMK 2-piece 10, 12 Inch frying pans nonstick set is the perfect choice for remodeling your kitchen from the ground up or replacing your old set. It's also ideal for special occasions like weddings, graduation ceremonies, setting up your first kitchen, housewarming parties, and even as a thoughtful holiday gift. You'll be proud to boast about this set to all your friends.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our durable and stable design can improve the cooking experience for chefs There's always room for improvement in cookware - that's the fundamental idea behind MSMK. Many of the cookware we use in our daily lives is so fragile that we take it for granted that we have to replace them often. We've found ways to extend the life of these products. 1 2 3 4 5 6
Great non stick Support omelette five times a day for 20 years Nonstick Non-stick even when scorched Scorched Passed stong test Passed the steel ball strong corrosion test stong

Comfortable Handle Y-shaped structure reduce heat transfer and maintain balance Hollow design The hollow design of the stainless steel handle can relieve weight Sanding design Reduces fingerprint impressions and increases comfort Double rivets Sturdy and durable

Unique heating induction The smooth induction bottom design helps distribute heat evenly, thereby improving the quality of your cooking and most importantly the taste of the food. Professional heat distribution 4mm-thick smooth stainless steel bottom & pot design with thick mouth and thin body allow for more even heat distribution.
Previous page The pot body is resistant to scratches from hardwood spatula at 700℉. Can still fry eggs after 40,000 wear tests Next page 1 Scratch-resistant 2 40,000 times wear test

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Frying pans are great!
reviews.reviewText: We use the pans for everything we fry such as eggs, chicken, bacon, French toast…. Everything turned out delicious!!!We love the pans, nothing to dislike!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality. It’s holding up great . I’ve had it for a few months now and have no complaints at all . You can fit 4 good size hamburger Pattie’s on it just to give you an idea on how big it is. It cleans very well . Everything washes off very easily for me . It doesn’t. The grill marks work pretty well but are not very apparent. I definitely would recommend this pan .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic non-stick skillets and customer service!
reviews.reviewText: These MSMK skillets are most likely the best non-stick cookware I've ever purchased, especially at this price point. I had initially settled on a similar all-clad set, but discovered these at about $30 less and thought I'd give them a shot because I liked the shape, stainless handles and stainless base much better. So glad I did. The skillets are substantial in heft, yet well-balanced with a really durable non-stick coating. I also liked the fact that they are oven safe to 450 degrees, so you can sear and oven finish dishes like salmon or chops.However, when the set arrived, the 12" pan had some "scuffing" on the bottom cooking surface coating. Probably still quite useable, but I didn't want to compromise on a new product. I checked the seller's info and discovered their email address, sending them a pic of the slight damage and explaining that I loved the set, but would like a replacement for the 12" product. I really didn't want to return both skillets since the 10" one was perfect.They got back to me in a day or so and I received the replacement in two days. I can't say enough good about that kind of responsiveness, not to mention that the skillets perform amazingly well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Edge is 1-1/2 inches high
reviews.reviewText: I like the higher edge than most other square pans do not have, it helps to contain the hot grease from splashing out when cooking bacon and other meets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well balanced for there price if taking care of will last a lifetime with kids depends your boldness

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They need to be prepared before first use.
reviews.reviewText: I really love my pans they are amazing. Would highly recommend. I rate them a 10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This wok is delivers all the descriptive details. I was looking for a comment on weight but didn’t see anything in any of the reviews. It is heavy so don’t expect to do any tossing of stir fry. But the sides are high enough so that any sauté stays in the pot and not on the stove top. Would recommend this wok for long term quality performance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but too heavy!
reviews.reviewText: This nonstick wok pan works well so far, but it is way too heavy, that’s the heaviest pan I ever bough
